title: Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon recreate iconic Friends scene
text:
Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon recreate iconic Friends scene (Picture: Getty Images)

Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon are back being the Green sisters as they recreated their iconic scene from Friends.

Just days after the Rachel star shared her first Instagram post, her on-screen sibling uploaded a clip of the duo acting out one of their infamous arguments.

And it is everything.

Reminding Jen of the script, Reese joked: ‘Do you remember your lines?’ to which her buddy shook her head at.

Holding up a picture of them both on set, the mother-of-one reminded her co-star of the scene.

‘Oh, I said… “You can’t have Ross,”‘ Jennifer beamed down the lens.

View this post on Instagram A post shared by Reese Witherspoon (@reesewitherspoon) on Oct 18, 2019 at 8:54am PDT

Her fellow actress replied: ‘Can’t have? Can’t have? The only thing I can’t have is dairy.’

Reese wrote alongside the post: ‘One of the best parts of working with Jen is reliving my favorite lines from #FRIENDS! 🥰 #theGreenSisters.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Fans were quick to comment and couldn’t contain their excitement over the reunion.

‘OMG you guys are so hilarious together!! My favorite duo,’ one wrote while another added: ‘I’ve watched this video 800 times.’

It’s everything (Picture: Getty Images)

Another said: ‘MY QUALITY OF LIFE JUST INCREASED BY SEEING THIS.’ The capitals are absolutely necessary.

Jen recently shared her first ever post on Instagram where she treated her followers to a full Friends reunion.

Courteney Cox (Monica), Matt LeBlanc (Joey), Matthew Perry (Chandler), David Schwimmer (Ross), and Lisa Kudrow (Phoebe) could all be seen smiling down the lens as they enjoyed their time together.

Next to the selfie, the 50-year-old said: ‘And now we’re Instagram FRIENDS too. HI INSTAGRAM.’

Despite only just joining, the Murder Mystery actress has amassed over 45,300 followers on Instagram.

She’s also following a whole bunch of legends, including ex-husband Justin Theroux.
